name: Dell i3535-A735BLK-PUS
specs: Inspiron 15.6" Touch Screen Laptop  -  AMD Ryzen 7 7730U with 16GB Memory  -  1TB SSD  -  Black

full_specs.Product Name: Inspiron 15.6" Touch Screen Laptop - AMD Ryzen 7 7730U with 16GB Memory - 1TB SSD
full_specs.USB Ports: 1 x USB-C 3.2, 1 x USB-A 3.2, 1 x USB-A 2.0
full_specs.Included Software: DAO/BCC/APJ No Security SoftwareMS Office 30-Day Trial

all_reviews.title: ALL IN ONE
all_reviews.body: It is an economically accessible computer, with excellent storage capacity, the performance has left me surprised and the multitasking it achieves is not to mention.

all_reviews.title: Happy With This Laptop So Far
all_reviews.body: So far, so good. Very fast boot up, not a lot of blue wear, and run smooth. Decent sound for a laptop, and plenty of RAM for my needs.

all_reviews.title: Hp
all_reviews.body: I am very happy with my purchase. Performance is exactly as described..

all_reviews.title: Woot woot
all_reviews.body: Love it, didn’t realize my old one was so outdated and dlow

all_reviews.title: DELL INSPIRON 15
all_reviews.body: BUENA,RAPIDA CON 1 TERA DE ALAMACENAMIENTO Y PANTALLA TOUCH. EXCELENTE

all_reviews.title: Great Computer
all_reviews.body: I really enjoy this computer. I appreciate the amount of memory and the full keyboard. The computer is so quick I can barely keep up which is a good thing. I use it a ton for work I bring home and for the planning I am doing for my family. My only qualm, which of course is personal and I know some don’t care, is the color. It is hard to not find a generic black, gray, or silver. But I am looking into a cover. Without me being so picky about the color I love the computer. The battery is great and I am pleased, the touch screen is a plus and I find myself enjoying that more than I thought.

all_reviews.title: New laptop
all_reviews.body: I really love this computer. I am learning more about each day. I had a little trouble hooking up the printer but the Geek Squad was able to do it in minutes. I will never be without the Geek Squad. I love the touch screen and the weight , much lighter than my last one. I have much more memory. It was a great choice for me.

all_reviews.title: Great Laptop at good price
all_reviews.body: Very Happy with my purchase. It has great performance, high speed, touch screen is convenient and plenty of storage. Price was also lowest the I shopped. Best Buy is also the place to get good quality products at a competitive price.

all_reviews.title: Perfect price
all_reviews.body: Best purchase that ive done in awhile, the speed is faster than i thought, graphics looks amazing, the battery life is longer than expected, and to top it off ots touchscreen.

all_reviews.title: Nice for the price
all_reviews.body: This laptop is a great size and very fast. I use it for a very limited gaming and working from home. A lot of the other laptops that I looked at were more expensive and didn't have the same features.

all_reviews.title: Love this machine!
all_reviews.body: I am super pleased with this purchase.  This is my first time to use a touch screen laptop, and it does not disappoint!  It has great features, like the numbers pad. The speed is great, too!

all_reviews.title: Mr
all_reviews.body: A very fast and efficient laptop. That response to command well and is very easy to setup. And easy to navigate. However, I wish it would come with chrome installed.

all_reviews.title: Would Buy again!
all_reviews.body: I love this laptop! The touchscreen works perfectly and the computer runs fast, opens quickly and is easy to navigate! I would buy it again!!!

all_reviews.title: Dell Inspiron 15.6” laptop
all_reviews.body: Needed new work computer and normally by HP and got this one on sale. Speed is great and screen size is perfect.

all_reviews.title: Great Laptop
all_reviews.body: I absolutely love this laptop. Great battery life, easy to set up , perfect for browsing and creativity

all_reviews.title: Dell laptop
all_reviews.body: A gift for my daughter. She raves about the performance and speed. Perfect for college student.

all_reviews.title: Sharp display and fast
all_reviews.body: This laptop offers everything I need. Speed is much faster than my old laptop. Display is sharp and clear.

all_reviews.title: Dell Computer
all_reviews.body: I have had the computer only for 1 month, so far no problems.  It is a nice computer, fast and lightweight.

all_reviews.title: Great Laptop Lets You Know It’s There
all_reviews.body:
Enjoying the laptop.  Was upgrade from a Sony Vaio I got in maybe 2010?  Loud fan, I had AC Infinity air management on my desktop, so laptop fan does not cycle as much as it does when “docked” -vs- being a laptop.  Loud fan.  Loud.


Love 100% of everything else.  What I needed it to be.  My “PC” alongside my “MAC.”  Both on home network, both access same files, and borh operate separate A/V Home Theater/Computer Systems.  

Fantastic Laptop.  I love it.

all_reviews.title: Dell Computer
all_reviews.body: I trust my Dell computer.  It is the perfect size and is easy to use.

all_reviews.title: Very Pleased
all_reviews.body: Very light weight and fast. Dell is the only computer I will ever buy.

all_reviews.title: Great laptop
all_reviews.body: Works great, light weight, and easy to use. I would recommend

all_reviews.title: Excellent specs for the price!
all_reviews.body: Excellent specs for the price. The screen is large and bright and touchscreen is a plus. 16 GB of Ram, a 1TB SSD and an AMD Ryzen 7 for this price is great.

all_reviews.title: Great Quality
all_reviews.body: So far so good. Its fast, light weight and im still learning about it

all_reviews.title: New Computer
all_reviews.body: New computer. I love this computer. Never had a touch screen before, its amazing.  Easy to set up right out of the box. Also a great price. A lot of bang for your buck.  I would definitely recommend this computer.

all_reviews.title: State of the Art Windows Computer
all_reviews.body: Great computer with smooth processor, at a great value price, needed it for my coding learning and it is perfect!

all_reviews.title: Perfext for a teen
all_reviews.body: Perfect laptop for our teen daughter who is pursuing animation, art and design. We got her a drawpad that connects and the laptop has handeled everything smoothly. The touch screen is a bonus, and the battery life is average, but the storage and speed are great.

all_reviews.title: Best Laptop I have bought
all_reviews.body:
very easy to set up, computer did it all!
handled over fifty different screen with no problem
bought at Best buy a week before Mem. Day sale  in May cheaper than the sale price. 550.00
Great screen without glare.
picked up at store with no scratches, dents or marks. Very happy with laptop and with Best Buy's service and people.

only complaints, not enough plug-ins, but does have to very lastest ones, just not enough though.

all_reviews.title: Fingerprint login is great!
all_reviews.body: Very good vakue for the proce it is fast and responsive. Easy to transfer previous laptop documents. Not bright enough for me but it is eaay to start up with just a fingerprint. My husband bought one then i bought one as well. Im on the laptop all day battery life is important to me and gave noticed it does drain rather quickly just from emails and reports.

all_reviews.title: Good all around laptop
all_reviews.body: Has done every3iv asked ofnit for work related stuff but can also stream with clear picture and play most games i play

all_reviews.title: Dell - Inspiron 15.6" Touch Screen Laptop
all_reviews.body: I recently upgraded to the Dell Inspiron 15.6″ Touch Screen Laptop, and it has truly exceeded my expectations. From the moment I powered it on, the sleek design and solid build quality made a great first impression. The laptop’s vibrant touch display is not only responsive but also delivers brilliant colors and sharp details, which makes everything, from streaming movies to creative projects, a joy to work with.

all_reviews.title: Dell laptop
all_reviews.body: Very good computer, I used as a personal computer and it works really great, good buy I recommend

all_reviews.title: Couldn’t pass up a great brand and a great deal!
all_reviews.body: Easy to use. Many features compared to my last computer. Love all the shortcuts. Well known brand. Best Buy had the best deal!  I couldn’t pass it up!  Thanks Best Buy!  Your sales are amazing!

all_reviews.title: Good Buy
all_reviews.body: Worked great out of the box. Did everything I expected of it.

all_reviews.title: Laptop
all_reviews.body: Its speed is quite good and for the price paid it performs very well

all_reviews.title: MaryJ
all_reviews.body: This is my first lap top so i do not have anything to compare it with but is seems good and easy to use.. I like the size of the screen and the weight of the lap top. I have not used it much but i think i will really like using it.

all_reviews.title: Laptop
all_reviews.body: Enjoying it very much. Good speed, long battery life.

all_reviews.title: Works well
all_reviews.body: The computer has worked well. I don't like that when you sleep it, the USB's stay powered up, but I think there may be a way to fix that.

all_reviews.title: Right size
all_reviews.body: Does what it's supposed to & just the right size .

all_reviews.title: Inspiron 15.6" Laptop
all_reviews.body: Working fine.  Easy file transfers and fast.  Fast startup.

all_reviews.title: Great laptop
all_reviews.body: Works like a champ. Definitely recommend at least 16gb

all_reviews.title: Great Buy
all_reviews.body: Great buy for the money. This laptop is easy to use and carry around while the battery is long lasting. The keyboard is simple to use and I like having the a number keyboard. The sale person explained the advantages of this laptop very well. Prefect laptop for me.

all_reviews.title: Laptop
all_reviews.body: Very good, works efficiently for all of my needs. Price was reasonable.

all_reviews.title: Great Laptop!!!
all_reviews.body: great laptop… if you’re looking for a budget laptop similar to a gaming laptop this is it. Definitely not a gaming laptop, but it works to play games very well specially on the Xbox game pass 10 out of 10 would recommend.

all_reviews.title: Berko1912
all_reviews.body: Cosmetic very nice. Its speed. My friend offer me. Thank my friend

all_reviews.title: Good computer for a good price
all_reviews.body: So far fairly happy with the new computer.  Need more time using it to be truly sure. It is fast and lite.  Getting used to the new position of the touch pad to keyboard ratio. I didn't want a touch screen but that's all they had in this make. It is convenient and a bit annoying when you inadvertently touch it. It was easy to set up, and I'm not unhappy with the purchase.

all_reviews.title: Selected the Dell, over HP
all_reviews.body:
My original plan was to purchase another HP laptop that didn't allow me to upgrade to Windows 11. 
 After talking with BB sales rep., settled on the Dell with more storage and same Labor Day sales price.

all_reviews.title: Purchased cause old PC not upradable to Windows 11
all_reviews.body:
Since the hardware on my old PC is not compatible with Windows 11, I purchased this to replace it.  Features missing that are on my other PC

The camera is not capable of Windows Hello Facial recognition.
No fingerprint reader.
No lighted keyboard, Helpful if the PC is used in the bedroom.
The one-year Dell Service does not include in-home service.

all_reviews.title: Dell purchase.
all_reviews.body: This is my 2nd time purchasing a Dell. In my own words. The specs on the Dell are great. It is a durable laptop and just enoigh for what I do. I explained what I need and looking for. The gentleman who helped me at Best Buy SFO, was helpful and informative.

all_reviews.title: Dell Inspiron
all_reviews.body: I needed an affordable laptop to replace an aging laptop that was beyond its years. You really can't go wrong with this laptop for the price. It performs really well, much better than I actually anticipated. I cannot comment on battery life since this stays plugged in, but so far I really like this laptop.

all_reviews.title: My wife's first laptop.
all_reviews.body: This laptop was a big move forward for my wife who has been using an old desktop PC for a decade or so. It works well on our wireless wifi network, We are happy with our purchase as of now.

all_reviews.title: Great Product
all_reviews.body: The laptop has been great. Both my wife and I use it for work from home things. It has performed beautifully./

all_reviews.title: Great Purchase
all_reviews.body: We bought this to replace a really old laptop and we're so pleased. It's fast, lightweight and has plenty of storage. Price was good and the woman who helped me in store made the transaction quick and easy.

all_reviews.title: Great Price, Good Laptop
all_reviews.body: I am mainly using this laptop for school but everything looks great to me. I got it at a discount and it helped since my budget is tight. If you are looking for a good laptop for college, then this one can be a good choice!

all_reviews.title: Great Laptop
all_reviews.body: My daughter loves all the new features of the Dell laptop. She previously own a Dell laptop and decided to replace it with this new model. The Touchscreen, more memory and SSD Drive are great improvements.

all_reviews.title: Great computer for Freshman year at college
all_reviews.body: Great computer to take to college. It is relatively light and has good battery capacity.

all_reviews.title: Dell #2
all_reviews.body:
After a “problem” with my computer I bought this new one which is very similar in most ways to the previous one.
I’m getting accustomed to the new one but, so far, I am very pleased.

all_reviews.title: Good for college
all_reviews.body: Gift for my cousin , he loved it - it meets all his college requirement.

all_reviews.title: Hard to clean install windows
all_reviews.body: Nice computer for the price, but I wish the keyboard was backlit.  Also don't like that the computer is running bitlocker, which makes it difficult to reformat hard drive for a clean install.  I do like that there is minimal bloatware pre-installed

all_reviews.title: Laptop deal
all_reviews.body: It is perfect for my needs.  It accepted all my cloud stuff.  I didn't have to remember all my passwords.  I just can't seem to install the 360 software I purchased. It keeps saying I already have it.

all_reviews.title: SUPER
all_reviews.body: So far so Great!  Kick butt laptop for the price, and I mean it!

all_reviews.title: My Dellis Great
all_reviews.body: Great replacement for 4yr old computer. It is better in all areas. According to my daughter, an Apple user, not so good in some. I am a  loyal Dell user, so who knows.

all_reviews.body:
Super fast service and very knowledgeable.
We were in and out.

all_reviews.title: New Dell
all_reviews.body: The computer works great. I am a little disappointed in the keyboard, not being typical due to the numbers pad. I keep hitting the wrong keys.

all_reviews.title: Dyslexic Inspiron user.
all_reviews.body: I love my new Inspiron 15.6. It’s easy to use. The touch screen makes it very easy for someone who is dyslexic like I am.

all_reviews.title: The Dell Inspiron 15.6 Touch Screen Laptop
all_reviews.body: The Dell Inspiron 15.6 Touch Screen Laptop was designed for users who require easily-accessed and updated apps and programs. It is completely “user friendly”.

all_reviews.title: New laptop
all_reviews.body: It’s a great laptop. However; it seems like the cursor disappears, and it’s harder to find it and control it, and I thought the speed would be more than what it is.

all_reviews.title: I Sure Miss My HP
all_reviews.body: I don't love this computer. The keyboard feels cheap. It keeps switching between tabs. I can perform all of my usual tasks, but it just isn't like my HP. I thought I'd give Dell a try. I'll return to HP in five years.

all_reviews.title: PC LAPTOP

all_reviews.title: Disappointed in the process
all_reviews.body: The computer was purchased on the 1st of May on the 4 th I used it and it was not working correctly, the Keys were not registering. I returned it to the store I purchased it from for an exchange (NO CASH  REFUND WAS ISSUED) at the Chesapeake square location they reserved one at the Greenbrier location for pickup as it was an exchange. The Greenbrier location stated that I would have to pay full price once again and then request a return for the initial payment and refused to give me the computer that was held and already paid for. In called customer service  and was advised to cancel that and go back to the Chesapeake Sq store and request they order the computer. It is now the 13th of May I am waiting on the computer and no money was returned no computer has been received. This has been a frustrating and disappointing purchase.

all_reviews.title: Dell
all_reviews.body: Battery wasn't too good but I was able to exchange with something else

all_reviews.title: Poor customer service
all_reviews.body: Screen went black computer was on but no screen. Was told to reach out to the manufacturer when i contacted Best Buy. Only had for about three weeks nothing happend to it wasn’t dropped so I spend almost a thousand dollars and get no help when it breaks less than a month in

all_reviews.title: Products fine, cust service SUCKS
all_reviews.body: Cust service sucks, some person in South Americas.  Can't even call the store.  Never buy from you again.

all_reviews.title: lasted 3 days
all_reviews.body: third day and it did a crash reset and would not let me reconnect to the internet. but it was perfect for three days. compliments to the next day delivery roadie.

all_reviews.title: GET IT WHILE YOU CAN
all_reviews.body:
The laptop is incredible for the deal, when I got it, it was $250 off. This is better than those other useless, garbage, and trashy Intel units. AMD is a million times more superior. AMD Radeon generally outperforms its competition for Windows 11: Intel Iris Xe Graphics. 60Hz refresh rate is good enough to handle many demanding or high-fps games. With 16GB of RAM, you can safely multitask with peace of mind, as updates will likely not affect it. And 1TB of storage is TOO GOOD for a laptop, you can safely carry large documents, assets, and archives with no problems whatsoever.

Tips for geeks: Dual-boot Windows 11 IoT LTSC Enterprise Subscription with Rufus (url: rufus.ie) and a copy of the ISO (url: massgraves.dev). Contains the latest perks and features, without the bloatware. This ensures your PC will run as expected.
